item.title: Installing Module Extras with Pipenv and Poetry
item.description: I thought it worth documenting how to install “extra” dependencies in Pipenv and Poetry after struggling to find the answer myself. Context: I hit a problem with uvicorn where the websockets module hadn’t been installed as a result of not including the “standard” extras. Rather than return an error, it just failed to connect the websocket which made me think something was wrong with my network configuration. As an example, take the following pip command:
